DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety Symbicort compare Pulmicort asthmatic child age 6 11 year
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Symbicort Asthmatic Children - SAPLING
DOC.criteria: At least 6 maximally 11 year age Diagnosis asthma Baseline lung function test determine protocol require receive daily treatment inhaled corticosteroid least 4 week prior study start Has require treatment noninhaled corticosteroid within previous 4 week , sensitivity drug specify protocol require treatment betablockers Has cancer previous 5 year significant disease may put patient risk study
